head.citation-title: Visual saliency using unit-linking PCNN image segmentation
head.abstracts: Â© 2017 IEEE.This paper introduces an approach to using Unit-linking Pulse Coupled Neural Network (Unit-linking PCNN) based image segmentation to enhance visual saliency. In the approach, Unit-linking PCNN is applied to perform the image segmentation task, and send the segmentation result to an attention model as one input channel with three other channels to generate the saliency map. The attention selection part of the approach in this paper is based on Phase spectrum of Quaternion Fourier Transform (PQFT). The experiments reveal that the proposed approach has better accuracy on attention selection than PQFT, which indicates that Unit-linking PCNN based image segmentation can lead to the saliency performance improvement by addressing the topological integrity of the whole target.
